this_title: America Outdoors with Baratunde Thurston Season 1
introduction: America Outdoors with Baratunde Thurston follows the bestselling author and podcaster as he explores the country’s diverse landscapes to see how they shape the way we work, play and interact with the outdoors. From coal miners turned beekeepers in Appalachia to Black surfers catching waves in L.A., uncover a deeper understanding of our passionate and complex relationship with the natural world.S1 E1 - Death Valley: Life BloomsS1 E2 - Idaho: Tied to the LandS1 E3 - LA: It's a VibeS1 E4 - Appalachia: A Different WayS1 E5 - Tidewater: HomecomingS1 E6 - Minnesota: A Better WorldProduction Company: TPT Twin Cities PBS; Part2 Pictures
chinese_title: America Outdoors with Baratunde Thurston Season 1
